content.rendered:
Fundbox Forward is a blog for business owners who are ready for more. We exist to help connect business owners with actionable insights, so they can take on today’s tasks and build tomorrow’s strategies.

With Forward, we share educational resources, tips, and guides for growing businesses. We also publish expert insights, entrepreneurship and technology thought leader interviews, and true stories from real business owners.

We’re always looking for new contributors. If you have ideas for in-depth, educational, original articles aimed at helping business owners grow and learn, we want to hear from you. Fill out our guest contributor form here.

What we’re looking for

At the heart of everything we do is our desire to help business owners gain financial power, improve their knowledge, and secure their futures. Publishing and promoting great content is an important part of that mission.

Here are examples of what we’re looking for:

  • Perspectives on business operations and growth from accounting and tax professionals
  • Marketing, growth, and business development guidance for growing businesses
  • Business technology and innovations relevant for business owners
  • Interviews, opinions, and informed predictions from finance and technology thought leaders
  • Real stories from entrepreneurs: real-life experiences growing businesses

Content guidelines

We strive to communicate in a straightforward, transparent, and helpful manner. We publish detailed, clear, and thoughtful articles written in an engaging tone. No previously-published articles or generic business jargon, please.

Articles should contain specific, actionable tips, advice, or other specific takeaways, wherever applicable. We welcome opinions, predictions, or contrarian thoughts—as long as you are able to back them up. Use supporting evidence, links, and data from reliable and trustworthy sources.

Ready with your ideas? Complete our guest contributor form here.

If your idea is a good fit, you’ll hear from us. Please note that we get a large volume of submissions, so we may not be able to respond right away. Thank you.
